formalpara.title: Figure 13:
formalpara.para: Satiety quiescence is dependent on pkg-1. A. A loss-of-function mutant of pkg-1, which encodes a cGMP dependent protein kinase, shows no satiety quiescence. B. A pkg-1 gain-of-function mutant shows satiety quiescence even without prefasting. Reproduced, with permission, from You et al. (2008).
